      • ProgramDriver.ProgramDescription

        public ProgramDriver.ProgramDescription(Class<?> mainClass,
                                String description)
                                 throws SecurityException,
                                        NoSuchMethodException
        Create a description of an example program.
        Parameters:
        mainClass - the class with the main for the example program
        description - a string to display to the user in help messages
        Throws:
        SecurityException - if we can't use reflection
        NoSuchMethodException - if the class doesn't have a main method
